title: How to Shorten Google Maps URLs

steps.headline: Go to Google Maps Labs.
steps.description: The URL is: http://maps.google.com/maps?showlabs=1. A box will pop up. In the box, you will see "Short URL".

steps.headline: Check a Google map.
steps.description: You should be able to see a small tab "Link" in the top right hand corner.

steps.headline: Right click on the "Link" tab.
steps.description: Your URL for that map will be immediately turned into a shortened URL, the box widening out for you. Copy and use as needed.

text: Go to Google Maps Labs. The URL is: http://maps.google.com/maps?showlabs=1. A box will pop up. In the box, you will see "Short URL". Click on "Enable". Click on "Save Changes". Check a Google map. You should be able to see a small tab "Link" in the top right hand corner. Right click on the "Link" tab. Your URL for that map will be immediately turned into a shortened URL, the box widening out for you. Copy and use as needed.
sentences: In the box, you will see "Short URL".
You should be able to see a small tab "Link" in the top right hand corner.
Your URL for that map will be immediately turned into a shortened URL, the box widening out for you.
